response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This unique item is not just an object; it's a testament to innovation and excellence. Given its exceptional features and craftsmanship, we believe its value far exceeds $10,000. Considering the immense value this product offers, I am extending a special offer to you for $15,000. This exclusive opportunity allows you to secure this masterpiece at a premium price before we consider other interested parties. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 15000}
